pkgmetadata.longdescription: ==================cee_syslog_handler==================.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/blue-yonder/cee_syslog_handler.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/blue-yonder/cee_syslog_handlerPython Syslog Logging Handler with CEE SupportUsage:: from cee_syslog_handler import CeeSysLogHandler import logging logger = logging.getLogger('log') logger.setLevel(logging.DEBUG) ch = CeeSysLogHandler(address=("10.2.160.20", 514)) ch.setLevel(logging.DEBUG) logger.addHandler(ch) logger.info("test")
